members.member:
Inisialisasi MainWindows disable bt_copy dan bt_save
Main Windows Initialization

OPERASI TOMBOL ENKRIPSI
bt_encrypt = Encrypt Button Click Event

OPERASI TOMBOL DEKRIPSI
bt_decrypt = Decrypt Button Click Event

OPERASI TOMBOL RESET tb_key = 0, tb_input = "", tb_output = ""
bt_reset = Reset Button Click Event

OPERASI TOMBOL COPY PASTE I/O ke Clipboard
bt_paste = Paste Button bt_copy = Copy Button Click Event

OPERASI TOMBOL KEY Increment dan Decrement nilai tb_key
bt_keyup dan bt_keydown Click Event

member.name: T:MaterialProject.My.MyWpfExtension
member.summary: Module used to define the properties that are available in the My Namespace for WPF

member.name: P:MaterialProject.My.MyWpfExtension.Application
member.summary: Returns the application object for the running application

member.name: P:MaterialProject.My.MyWpfExtension.Computer
member.summary: Returns information about the host computer.

member.name: P:MaterialProject.My.MyWpfExtension.User
member.summary: Returns information for the current user. If you wish to run the application with the current Windows user credentials, call My.User.InitializeWithWindowsUser().

member.name: P:MaterialProject.My.MyWpfExtension.Log
member.summary: Returns the application log. The listeners can be configured by the application's configuration file.

member.name: P:MaterialProject.My.MyWpfExtension.Windows
member.summary: Returns the collection of Windows defined in the project.

member.name: T:MaterialProject.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:MaterialProject.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:MaterialProject.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.
